org.aludratest.config

Annotation Type InternalComponent


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface InternalComponent
    This annotation marks a component or service interface as "internal". Only interfaces marked with this annotation can be marked as singleton, which ensures that they will only be instantiated once per AludraTest invocation.
    Author:
    falbrech

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean singleton
      If true, ensures that this service will only be instantiated once.

    • Element Detail

      • singleton

        public abstract boolean singleton
        If true, ensures that this service will only be instantiated once. Additional calls to AludraServiceManager.newImplementorInstance(Class) will receive the same instance.
        Returns:
        true if only one instance of the marked class shall be instantiated at runtime, false otherwise.
        Default:
        false
